definitions: using or relating to a circular movement about an axis or center

examples.text: the increased rotational speed of today's disk drives

shortDefinitions: using or relating to circular movement about axis or centre

definitions: relating to the conceptual operation of turning a system about an axis.
shortDefinitions: relating to conceptual operation of turning system about axis

definitions: relating to or denoting a system in which privilege or responsibility is passed to each member of a group in a regularly recurring order

examples.text: reward all selected students on a rotational basis

shortDefinitions: relating to or denoting system in which privilege or responsibility is passed to each member of group in recurring order

definitions: relating to or denoting a system of grazing in which animals are grazed successively on different areas of land
shortDefinitions: relating to or denoting system of grazing in which animals are grazed successively on different areas of land
